name: Digital Ehon Vol. 3: Imadoki no Saru Kani
overview: Digital Ehon Vol. 3 - Imadoki no Saru kani is based on the japanese fairy tale of the same name. The gameplay is like the usual in an interactive book since in the first game mode the player can interact with each image using the pointer to see different objects or characters moving, and in the second game mode is just to watch the story without any kind of interaction. The game features full japanese voice acting.
